restic 0.9.0 released

21 May 2018

Weâ€™ve just released restic 0.9.0. This is the next bigger release since 0.8.0, it mainly brings a completely rewritten archiver core, improves the speed for restic check, and many bug fixes.

For downloading the new release and see a more detailed list of important changes, head over to GitHub. As always, thanks for reporting any issues you encounter! Or just write a post in the forum.
